description: Developer and podcaster based in Nebraska. TypeScript enthusiast, transpiling dreams into reality.

projects.title: JS Party
projects.description: A weekly podcast about JavaScript and the web. I'm part of a regular cast of panelists/hosts.

projects.title: TalkScript
projects.description: A podcast focusing on TypeScript and the people that use it. It's the official podcast of TSConf!

projects.title: TypeScript Conf US
projects.description: A conference about TypeScript featuring the people that work with and on TypeScript.

projects.title: NebraskaJS
projects.description: A monthly meetup for JavaScript developers in Nebraska with over 1500 members.

projects.title: NebraskaJS Conference
projects.description: A regional conference showcasing the best in the industry from around the world and right here in Nebraska.
